meanings.definition: The act of making a harsh or loud noise while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: My dad's snorings kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: The snorings coming from the bedroom were so loud.
meanings.sent3: The cat's snorings were so loud, it woke up the whole house!
meanings.sent4: The snorings of the old house echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the snorings that filled the room.

meanings.definition: A series of loud, harsh noises made while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: The snorings of my brother can be heard from the other room.
meanings.sent2: She was startled awake by the sudden snorings in the quiet room.
meanings.sent3: The snorings of the bear in the zoo sounded like a symphony.
meanings.sent4: The snorings of the engine put me to sleep on the train.
meanings.sent5: The snorings of the wind in the trees lulled me into a peaceful slumber.
